eventDialog.noEventsForDate: There are no events scheduled for {{date}}.

faqSection.needHelp: Need help with something? Here are our most frequently asked questions.

what-is-plan-genie-ai.question: What is Plan Genie AI?
what-is-plan-genie-ai.answer: Plan Genie AI is a smart application designed to help you manage your daily tasks and events effortlessly using advanced AI.

how-does-it-help-me.question: How does Plan Genie AI make my life easier?
how-does-it-help-me.answer: It automates task creation, plans your events, and helps you track your progress, all by understanding your notes and voice inputs.

what-can-i-input.question: What kind of information can I give to Plan Genie AI?
what-can-i-input.answer: You can simply type your notes or speak voice messages, and Plan Genie AI will understand and process them.

how-does-it-understand-my-input.question: How does it understand what I say or type?
how-does-it-understand-my-input.answer: It uses advanced AI to identify important details like priorities, deadlines, dates, and context from your text or voice.

can-it-handle-different-languages.question: Can Plan Genie AI understand different languages?
can-it-handle-different-languages.answer: Yes, it's designed to process information in multiple languages, making it flexible for various users.

automatic-tasks.question: Does it create tasks for me automatically?
automatic-tasks.answer: Absolutely! It automatically creates organized task lists with priorities and deadlines based on your input.

calendar-sync.question: Can it add events to my calendar?
calendar-sync.answer: Yes, it can sync the events it identifies directly with an interactive calendar for easy viewing.

can-i-change-things.question: What if I need to change a task or event it created?
can-i-change-things.answer: You have full control. You can easily modify any tasks or events that Plan Genie AI generates.

daily-reports.question: Can I see how productive I've been?
daily-reports.answer: Yes, it generates daily summaries of your completed activities and shows you how well you're managing your tasks.

visualize-progress.question: Can I see my progress visually?
visualize-progress.answer: It provides interactive charts to help you visualize your task completion, deadlines, and how you spend your time.

notifications.question: Will I get reminders for important tasks?
notifications.answer: Definitely! It sends you custom alerts for upcoming deadlines and high-priority tasks to keep you on track.

proactive-suggestions.question: Does it give me tips to be more efficient?
proactive-suggestions.answer: Yes, it can offer smart suggestions to help you optimize your priorities and make the most of your time.

app-availability.question: Where can I use Plan Genie AI?
app-availability.answer: It's available as a responsive website that you can access from any modern web browser. Mobile apps are also being developed!

heroSection.title: Plan Genie AI makes task management effortless
heroSection.subtitle: Transform your notes and voice memos into organized tasks and events with our intelligent AI assistant that understands your priorities.
heroSection.taskAnalysisDesc: Automatically analyze and categorize your tasks with priorities and deadlines.
heroSection.eventPlanningDesc: Convert notes into calendar events with smart date and time detection.
heroSection.voiceInputDesc: Record your thoughts and let our AI transform voice into structured tasks.
heroSection.aiPoweredDesc: Advanced NLP extracts key information to help you stay organized and productive.

hero.description: Plan Genie AI helps you manage your tasks and events effortlessly. Using AI-powered automation, we transform your notes and voice inputs into well-structured schedules, reminders, and reports.

cookieConsent.title: Cookie Preferences
cookieConsent.description: We use cookies to keep you logged in and ensure secure access to your account.
cookieConsent.policyDescription: How we use cookies on our website.
cookieConsent.whatAreCookiesDescription: Cookies are small text files stored on your device that help our website remember your login session.
cookieConsent.authenticationCookiesDescription: We use JWT (JSON Web Token) cookies to keep you logged in. These cookies are essential for the website to function properly.
cookieConsent.whyDoWeNeedThemDescription: Without these cookies, you would need to log in every time you visit our site. They ensure secure access to your account.
cookieConsent.yourPrivacyDescription: These cookies only store your authentication status. We don't track your browsing activity or collect personal information beyond what's needed for login.
